```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)

dat = read_csv("groups.csv")
```

This is my report:

Notice that here there is no need for framing ui elements neither assign them to
ui and server variables.

```{r eruptions, echo=FALSE}
inputPanel({
  checkboxGroupInput(
    inputId= "checked_groups",
    label="Which groups do you want to display?",
    choices=c("a", "b", "c"),
    selected=c("a", "b", "c", "d")
  )
})

renderPlot({
  plot_data = filter(dat, Group %in% input$checked_groups)
  ggplot(data = plot_data,
         aes(x= varX, y = varY, color = Group)) + geom_point()
})
```
